com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Acceleration scaling
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: Defines the scaling factor applied to the output acceleration vector

com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Acceleration gamma
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: Defines the exponent that is applied to the output acceleration vector, downscaled by a factor of 100.

com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Acceleration center
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: Defines the center of the curvature created by the gamma value.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Free fall
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Low pass filter to separate gravity from other forces

com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Gravity scaling
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: Defines the scaling factor applied to the filtered gravity

com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Low-pass filter alpha
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: Defines the value of the alpha coefficient used in the low pass filter. A smaller alpha means more smoothing.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Absolute IR Pointer
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Directly maps every point from the touchscreen to a point in the real screen

com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Packet send delay
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: Defines the wait time to send every UDP packet
